name: ONE PIECE RAINBOW！
summary: One Piece Rainbow! is the second animation artbook. It covers episodes from the end of the Alabasta Arc up to Enies Lobby Arc. It contains an episode guide, information on the main characters, the show series, voice actors, music and sketches.
info:
• 出版社: 集英社
  • 价格: ￥ 1,500
  • 发售日: 2007-05-01
  • 页数: 288
  • ISBN: 4088740998
